title: Magic Watchface Free
summary: Magic watchface comes with a simple and cool design.
developerAddress: Office #2, 2nd Floor, 37- A, Civic Centre, Bahria Town, Islamabad
description: Magic watchface comes with a simple and cool design. It is a funky watchface packing cool colors for a smart look to display time. Second hand rotates in a semicircle on a white background creating a simple and funky contrast. To keep you updated, day and date is placed in the center of the watch for quick and easy readability. This funky watchface sure brings colors to your watch. Watch360 focus is in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.Key custom features:-• Easy Readability.• Cool designs with colorful backgrounds.• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than everThis watch face is for round/circular smart watches such as the Motorola Moto 360, LG G WATCH R and LG watch Urbane. Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.
descriptionHTML:
Magic watchface comes with a simple and cool design. It is a funky watchface packing cool colors for a smart look to display time. Second hand rotates in a semicircle on a white background creating a simple and funky contrast. To keep you updated, day and date is placed in the center of the watch for quick and easy readability. This funky watchface sure brings colors to your watch.
Watch360 focus is in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.
Key custom features:-

• Easy Readability.
• Cool designs with colorful backgrounds.
• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than ever
This watch face is for round/circular smart watches such as the Motorola Moto 360, LG G WATCH R and LG watch Urbane. Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.
